thread.title: College hockey: Final: Miami 1, St. Lawrence 0
thread.title_full: College hockey: Final: Miami 1, St. Lawrence 0

title: College hockey: Final: Miami 1, St. Lawrence 0
text:
A A 
CANTON — No. 14-ranked Miami defeated No. 17 St. Lawrence University, 1-0 on Friday night in a nonconference men’s hockey game at Appleton Arena. 
Jack Roslovic scored the game’s only goal with a power-play tally four minutes, 42 seconds into the second period for the RedHawks (3-1-1). 
The Saints (3-2) went scoreless on all seven of their power plays.
